Drinking Games. Online.

Games

— Power Hour —

Power hour is a simple yet challenging drinking game. The objective is to drink one shot of beer each minute for an hour. Make it to the end and you'll have downed 7-8 beers.

— Kings Cup —

Kings cup is a fun social drinking game. Players take turns drawing cards from a deck. Each card has an associated mini game.

— Beer Pong —

Beer pong is one of the most well known social drinking games. Teams take turns tossing ping pong balls into beer filled cups. The main objective is to eliminate the other team's cups by landing a ball in every cup.

— Boxing —

Boxing is a fun team based game. The game works best with teams of 2, but can be played with teams of 1. Boxers (drinkers) compete in 3 minute rounds until the opposing boxer pukes or quits. The cornermen (non drinking team members) help fill shot glasses during rounds and provide much needed moral support.
